alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 19 at 10:30AM AKDT until March 20 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 55 to 60 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong Bering Sea low will bring increasing winds to the Pribilof Islands Sunday night. The strongest winds are expected on Saint Paul Island Monday morning based on the forecast track of the low. Winds will gradually diminish and shift out of the west through the rest of the day Monday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
